title: 1032 The Power of Service
description:
“Serve people based on your values, your passions, and the impacts you want to create.”

Sometimes we forget why we're really here on this planet, and it can keep us trapped in our own heads worrying about things that don't really matter, but on today's 5-minute Friday Lewis guides us through some of the reasons why serving other people (and staying in the Service Mindset) is so powerful for your life!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1032

Mel Robbins: The “Secret” Mindset Habit to Building Confidence and Overcoming Scarcity: https://link.chtbl.com/970-pod

Dr. Joe Dispenza on Healing the Body and Transforming the Mind: https://link.chtbl.com/826-pod

Master Your Mind and Defy the Odds with David Goggins: https://link.chtbl.com/715-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
